title: Black bean salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '2 (340g) tins sweetcorn, drained', '8 spring onions, chopped', '2 green chillies, seeded and minced', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and diced', '100g (4 oz) jarred roasted red peppers, drained and chopped', '3 tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '1 small bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '1 lime, juiced', '8 tablespoons Italian salad dressing, or homemade vinaigrette']
